spell.name: Abi-Dalzim's Horrid Wilting
spell.components: V, S, M (a bit of sponge)
spell.shortDescription: You draw the moisture from every creature in a 30-foot cube centered on a point you choose within range. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw. Constructs and undead aren't affected, and plants and water elementals make this saving throw with disadvantage. A creature takes 10d8 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. -
